issue.title: [CI][Python] wheel can't be built by wget and OpenSSL error
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7247](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7247). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```

dyld: Library not loaded: /usr/local/opt/openssl/lib/libssl.1.0.0.dylib
  Referenced from: /usr/local/bin/wget
  Reason: image not found
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7247?focusedCommentId=16980947) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5887
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5887>
